articles.description: Harry Kane marked his 400th appearance for Tottenham with another goal from the spot, but  Richarlison's injury could test the squad's depth limits.
articles.content: LONDON -- Tottenham Hotspur beat Everton as Harry Kane and Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg scored to secure a 2-0 win on Saturday to draw level on points with second-placed Manchester City in the Premier Leagu… [+7680 chars]

articles.author: Sandeep Dwivedi
articles.title: Sourav Ganguly saga: First we treat them as Gods and later expect them to behave like mortals - The Indian Express
articles.description: As the Indian board chief, he would sit for selection committee meetings, even promise Wriddhiman Saha - allegation made by wicket-keeper himself - a place in the national team.
articles.content: Kolkata has pampered Sourav Ganguly silly. The city treats him like royalty, still calling the 50-year-old by his pet name Maharaja. It’s where he always got his way.His father was an influential Ede… [+4851 chars]
